game.name: RUSH
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From the twisted puzzle minds behind the award winning Toki Tori comes a new game, simply called RUSH. Fortunately for fans of high quality puzzle games, RUSH is anything but simple. In the game's fully three dimensional levels, players need to guide cubes to color coded exit points using Conveyor b
